categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Dalls Petothel was a male Human who served as an officer within Imperial Intelligence during the first years of the New Order. He was the father of Gara Petothel and husband of Edallia Monotheer. He worked as an Imperial Intelligence agent for Director of Imperial Intelligence Armand Isard. Later he was executed together with his wife for giving out information to anti-Imperial faction on Chandrila, though none of them worked for Rebel Alliance.
